abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio says he will personally sign off on all decisions pertaining to lifting of deed restrictions going forward; announcement follows criticism over removal of deed restriction on Harlem lot that confined property's use to nonprofit cultural organizations; change allowed Dance Theater of Harlem, which paid city to lift restriction, to sell property to BRP Companies for residential development at great profit.
lead_paragraph: “We want more community engagement,” Mayor Bill de Blasio said as he released memos in response to questions about a deed change in Harlem.

headline.main: De Blasio, Facing New Questions, Promises Public Input on Deed Changes
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Vows Personal Role in Any New Changes to Deeds

snippet: “We want more community engagement,” Mayor Bill de Blasio said as he released memos in response to questions about a deed change in Harlem.
